GSD.description:
usb: dwc2: check return value after calling platform_get_resource()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.72 by commit 2754fa3b73df7d0ae042f3ed6cfd9df9042f6262. For more details please see the references link.
